title: Paste.exe for copying contents of windows clipboard to STDOUT
body: I use clip.exe heavily; it is VERY convenient.

comments.body: A workaround has been identified - see https://stackoverflow.com/questions/55974462/pipe-from-clipboard-in-linux-subsytem-for-windows/56584029#56584029.
@Cyrille Lefevre - that is a good point. The name should probably be something else then. Perhaps "cbpaste.exe"
paste is a standard unix command : merge lines of files
Oops - I see I didn't finish that second sentence. Should read "Having a companion paste.exe that copies the contents of the clipboard to STDOUT would be awesome."
